A

AbstractArchiveMojo - Class in com.github.jlgrock.javascriptframework.sourcearchive
Essentially the same as the Assembly Plugin Mojo, with a convenience function to have the src assembly xml files set up for you already.
AbstractArchiveMojo() - Constructor for class com.github.jlgrock.javascriptframework.sourcearchive.AbstractArchiveMojo
 
appendAssemblyId - Variable in class com.github.jlgrock.javascriptframework.sourcearchive.AbstractArchiveMojo
Set to false to exclude the assembly id from the assembly final name.
assemblyDescriptorLocation - Variable in class com.github.jlgrock.javascriptframework.sourcearchive.AbstractArchiveMojo
Location to get the assembly descriptor.
